00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <mfhdf.h>
00022 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00023 
00040 MTKt_status MtkFillValueGet(
00041   const char *filename, 
00042   const char *gridname, 
00043   const char *fieldname, 
00044   MTKt_DataBuffer *fillbuf  )
00045 {
00046   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00047   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00048   intn hdfstatus;               /* HDF-EOS return status */
00049   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS File id */
00050 
00051   if (filename == NULL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00053 
00054   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00055   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00056 
00057   /* Get fill value */
00058   status = MtkFillValueGetFid(fid, gridname, fieldname, fillbuf);
00059   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00060 
00061   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00062   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00063 
00064   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00065  ERROR_HANDLE:
00066   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00067   return status_code;
00068 }
00069 
00075 MTKt_status MtkFillValueGetFid(
00076   int32 fid,            
00077   const char *gridname, 
00078   const char *fieldname, 
00079   MTKt_DataBuffer *fillbuf  )
00080 {
00081   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00082   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00083   intn hdfstatus;               /* HDF-EOS return status */
00084   int32 gid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS Grid id */
00085   int32 hdf_datatype;           /* HDF-EOS data type */
00086   int32 rank;                   /* Not used */
00087   int32 dims[10];               /* Not used */
00088   char dimlist[80];             /* Not used */
00089   MTKt_DataBuffer fillbuf_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00090                                 /* Temp fill buffer */
00091   MTKt_DataType datatype;       /* Mtk data type */
00092   char *basefield = NULL;   /* Base fieldname */
00093   int nextradims;       /* Number of extra dimensions */
00094   int *extradims = NULL;    /* Extra dimension list */
00095 
00096   if (gridname == NULL ||
00097       fieldname == NULL || fillbuf == NULL)
00098     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00099 
00100   gid = GDattach(fid, (char*)gridname);
00101   if (gid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED);
00102 
00103   status = MtkParseFieldname(fieldname, &basefield, &nextradims, &extradims);
00104   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00105 
00106   hdfstatus = GDfieldinfo(gid, basefield, &rank, dims, &hdf_datatype, dimlist);
00107   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDFIELDINFO_FAILED);
00108 
00109   status = MtkHdfToMtkDataTypeConvert(hdf_datatype, &datatype);
00110   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00111 
00112   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(1, 1, datatype, &fillbuf_tmp);
00113   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00114 
00115   hdfstatus = GDgetfillvalue(gid, basefield, fillbuf_tmp.dataptr);
00116   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDGETFILLVALUE_FAILED);
00117 
00118   hdfstatus = GDdetach(gid);
00119   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDDETACH_FAILED);
00120 
00121   *fillbuf = fillbuf_tmp;
00122 
00123   free(basefield);
00124   free(extradims);
00125   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00126  ERROR_HANDLE:
00127   if (gid != FAIL) GDdetach(gid);
00128   if (basefield != NULL) free(basefield);
00129   if (extradims != NULL) free(extradims);
00130   MtkDataBufferFree(&fillbuf_tmp);
00131   return status_code;
00132 }
